name: Subpoena and Deposition Practice
description: Templates for subpoena practice, medical records, employment records, and deposition preparation

templates.description: Analyze plaintiff's motion to quash medical record subpoenas in contemplation of further case handling strategy regarding the same.
Analyze plaintiff's motion to quash employment record subpoenas in contemplation of further case handling strategy regarding the same.
Analyze plaintiff's separate statement in support of its motion to quash medical record subpoenas to determine further case handling.
Analyze plaintiff's separate statement in support of its motion to quash employment record subpoenas to determine further case handling.
Analyze plaintiff alleged injuries to draft revised narrowly tailored subpoenas regarding [CLIENT NAME] medical records.
Analyze plaintiff's loss of earning claim to draft revised narrowly tailored subpoenas regarding [CLIENT NAME] employment records.
Draft modified document request language with subpoena for medical records and billing to [MEDICAL FACILITY] regarding plaintiff's alleged injuries.
Draft modified document request language with subpoena for [PLACE OF EMPLOYMENT] medical records and billing to [MEDICAL FACILITY] regarding plaintiff's alleged injuries.
Draft modified document request language with subpoena for facility regarding plaintiff's alleged injuries and damages.
Draft modified document request language with subpoena for [PLACE OF EMPLOYMENT] regarding plaintiff's alleged injuries and damages.
Draft modified document request language with subpoena for [PLACE OF EMPLOYMENT] regarding plaintiff's alleged injuries and damages.
Draft meet and confer letter with subpoenas request.
Analyze facts of case in contemplation for drafting plaintiff's deposition outline regarding the same.
Draft lines of questioning regarding facts of case in preparation for plaintiff's deposition.
Analyze plaintiff's physical injury allegations in preparation for drafting lines of questioning concerning the same.
Draft lines of questioning regarding plaintiff physical injury allegations in preparation for [CLIENT NAME] deposition.
Analyze plaintiff's mental injury allegations in preparation for drafting lines of questioning concerning the same.
Draft lines of questioning regarding plaintiff mental injury allegations in preparation for [CLIENT NAME] deposition.
Analyze California's strict liability code sections in preparation for drafting lines of questioning concerning the same.
Draft lines of questioning regarding California's strict liability code sections in preparation for plaintiff's deposition.
Analyze plaintiff's damages in preparation for drafting lines of questioning concerning the same.
Draft lines of questioning regarding plaintiff damages in preparation for [CLIENT NAME] deposition.
Analyze plaintiff's loss of earnings claim in preparation for drafting lines of questioning concerning the same.
Draft lines of questioning regarding plaintiff loss of earnings claim in preparation for [CLIENT NAME] deposition.
Begin exhibit preparation regarding documents to be used at plaintiff's deposition.
Analyze plaintiff's injuries in contemplation of drafting [CLIENT NAME] discovery set one to plaintiff.
Analyze plaintiff's damages in contemplation of drafting [CLIENT NAME] discovery set one to plaintiff.
Begin drafting [CLIENT NAME] special interrogatories to plaintiff.
